content:
I notice that the "acceptUnknown" element was removed from the CapabilityStatement in R4.

How does an R4 server declare that it will not accept unknown extensions?
Thanks @Grahame Grieve - I assume that implementers just need to declare their rules by some other means. In our case we do not want to accept unknown extensions, .
well, you can propose something back.I think the problem was that a single true / false value doesn't match anybody's reality

I'll raise a ticket - but R5 is a long way away for us in the UK. I'll see if we can create an extension in the UK for the R4 at least.
I get the rationale that it was confusing, but as that was 2.5 years ago, I guess it's not something that a lot of people are concerned about.
